title: Dismembered Body Washes up in 3 FANCY DESIGNER SUITCASES
itunes:title: Dismembered Body Washes up in 3 FANCY DESIGNER SUITCASES
description:
The dismembered body of Bill McGuire is found in three separate dark green Kenneth Cole suitcases near Virginia Beach, Virginia. The medical examiner determines that the body had been shot multiple times. Now, 13 years later the convicted killer, his wife, maintains her innocence.

 

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, Anchor on Court TV, www.ashleywillcott.com 
  • Dr. Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga www.angelaarnoldmd.com
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet" featured on "Poisonous Liaisons" on True Crime Network
  • Kristen Quon - WCYB Bristol, Va - Reporter
  • John Glatt - Author of book about Melanie McGuire case, "To Have and To Kill" available on Amazon, www.johnglatt.com  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
